transcript: so when someone's like I can't stand this the statement in of itself is self-conflict you can't stand it because you are standing it you may be uncomfortable but you are literally a living example of the fact that the statement was false and if you truly can't stand it you will die in which case you won't need to stand it so pretty much your default situation is standing which I think is kind of cool none of those events which felt like the end of the world actually did end my world because I am still here
